text: Need Blake Morgan for Adairs camp. Budget around $29,515, looking for 2 x TikTok video, 2 x Instagram post, 3 x Brand photoshoot, 2 x Pinterest pin. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
